Definition: The input contains an argument and a keypoint on the topic "We should fight urbanization", separated by "<sep>".Your task is to answer if the keypoint matches the argument and summarizes exactly what the argument means, in the context of this topic.

Positive Examples.input: Argument: Urbanization can create job opportunities people benefit from improved facilities such as hospitals schools shops etc<sep>Keypoint: Cities offer more opportunities
Positive Examples.explanation: The keypoint summarizes the argument that urbanization can create job opportunities people benefit from improved facilities such as hospitals schools shops etc

Positive Examples.input: Argument: We should stop urbanization because of the pollution and over crowding problems it causes.<sep>Keypoint: Urbanization causes crime
Positive Examples.explanation: The keypoint does not summarize the argument that we should stop urbanization because of the pollution and over crowding problems it causes.

Positive Examples.input: Argument: Urbanization leads to the destruction of many animals and plants.<sep>Keypoint: Urbanization harms the environment
Positive Examples.explanation: The keypoint summarizes the argument that urbanization leads to the destruction of many animals and plants.

Negative Examples.input: Argument: Urbanization ruins the environment and pushes out existing animal species from their homes.<sep>Keypoint: Restrictions on migration would benefit people in the rural areas economically/socially
Negative Examples.explanation: The keypoint does not summarize the argument that urbanization ruins the environment and pushes out existing animal species from their homes.

Negative Examples.input: Argument: Urbanization helps to create jobs & new opportunities for people<sep>Keypoint: Cities offer more opportunities
Negative Examples.explanation: The keypoint summarizes the argument that urbanization helps to create jobs & new opportunities for people

Negative Examples.input: Argument: Urbanization allows populations easier access to food and services that improve quality of life.<sep>Keypoint: Urbanization benefits the economy
Negative Examples.explanation: The keypoint does not summarize the argument that urbanization allows populations easier access to food and services that improve quality of life.
